modName: Lighweight male clothes - farmer merchant and wench
summary: This is a retexture of male clothing in Skyrim to be lightweight...
descriptionHtml:
=======Description============================
Since I use a lot of mod of skimpy armor, I found male classics clothes not enough light , I so slightly reduce it.
I use favoredsoul meshes for male body.

Install
======
Download this file, unpack it to your Skyrim data folder.
or use nmn.

Credit
============
favoressoul and chris57 for male body.

Excuse my english, French people doesn't speak other language very well...
author: kentin15
